title: 96/349/EC: Commission Decision of 24 May 1996 approving the plan relating to the examination for residues submitted by Finland (Only the Finnish text is authentic) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 24 May 1996 approving the plan relating to the examination for residues submitted by Finland (Only the Finnish text is authentic) (Text with EEA relevance) (96/349/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The plan relating to the examination for residues of the substances referred to in Annex I to Directive 86/469/EEC submitted by Finland is hereby approved.
Finland shall adopt the necessary laws, regulations and administrative provisions for the implementation of the plan referred to in Article 1.
This Decision shall apply to the Republic of Finland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 May 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 275, 26. 9. 1986, p. 36.
